definition: Chinese person who returns to China after living as an expatriate

to return/to go back to/to give back to/(of a responsibility) to be taken care of by/to belong to/to gather together/(used between two identical verbs) despite/to marry (of a woman) (old)/division on the abacus with a one-digit divisor

sentences.english: In this special condition of those days, this measure can efficiency to help the overseas Chinese.
sentences.chinese: 在當時的條件下，這一措施有效地解決了歸僑之難。

definition: family members of nationals residing abroad
youth corps/youth wing of a political party
to love Hong Kong (usually implying that one also supports the PRC government)
Four Asian Tigers/East Asian Tigers/Four Little Dragons (East Asian economic powers: Taiwan, South Korea, Singapore and Hong Kong)
lit. as close as lips and teeth (idiom); closely related/interdependent
student of a senior high school
